representation_information.name: OpenDocument Presentation Document Format (ODP), Version 1.2. Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
representation_information.description: An XML-based format for editable presentation documents, usually with file extension .odp. Part of the OpenDocument Format (ODF) format family. Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1. Component files are packaged using a constrained version of the ZIP format.
